HOWL: Homebrewers of Western Loudoun

The concept for HOWL was born in the barn of Loudoun County's first brewery as the founders saw a demand for local homebrewers eager to improve their craft and express their creativity with other fellow brewers.

HOWL has evolved into a dedicated community of passionate homebrewers that meet monthly in person and every day online. If you are looking for brewing knowledge, honest feedback, and like-minded friends, apply to join today.

Monthly Meetups

HOWL meets on the first Thursday of every month, where home brewed beers are shared and discussed. Some members may choose to brew our "style of the month" with a chance to win an award!

Online Community

HOWL has an active Facebook group where members post and answer questions, share homebrew deals and interests, and inform the group of various craft brewing events.

Special Events

From partnering with local breweries for friendly competitions among area brewers, to our yearly "White Elephant" special ingredient competition, come create lasting memories with HOWL!
